name: Altaf Tadavi
description: '''Altaf Sheikh''' (born 30 August 1999), known professionally as '''MC STAN''' (stylized as '''MC STâˆ†N'''), is an Indian [[Rapping|rapper]], lyricist, [[Record producer|music producer]], and composer. He is known for his work in the [[Music of India|Hindi hip-hop]] and [[trap music]] scene. In 2023, he won the reality television show ''[[Bigg Boss (Hindi season 16)|Bigg Boss 16]]''.
